Increased abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also fat around the organs of your abdomen, it's linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems. Eat whole unprocessed foods, practice good sleep hygiene, and try to manage your stress

Lifestyle modifications for reflux include weight loss, head-of-bed elevation, and avoid tobacco, alcohol, and late-night meals as well as avoiding large meals and aggravating foods e.g. caffeine, coffee, chocolate, spicy foods, highly acidic foods (oranges, tomatoes), and fatty foods.
